org-tagline: Advocating for Rights, Building Awareness, Creating Change
hero-description: The Albinism Foundation Zambia is dedicated to advocating for the rights of individuals with albinism, promoting awareness, and building an inclusive society where everyone can thrive.
mission-statement: To advocate for the rights, dignity, and inclusion of persons with albinism in Zambia through awareness campaigns, policy advocacy, support services, and community empowerment programs.
focus-rights-desc: Championing policy changes and legal protections to ensure equal rights and opportunities for all persons with albinism.
focus-awareness-desc: Educating communities about albinism to combat myths, misconceptions, and discrimination through targeted outreach programs.
focus-support-desc: Providing essential services including sunscreen distribution, protective clothing, and healthcare access coordination.
focus-education-desc: Ensuring children with albinism have access to quality education with appropriate accommodations and support systems.
news-1-excerpt: Our comprehensive awareness campaign reaches rural communities across Zambia to combat discrimination and promote understanding.
news-2-title: Policy Victory: New Protection Measures Approved
news-2-excerpt: Government approves new legislative measures to protect persons with albinism from violence and discrimination.
news-3-excerpt: AFZ extends educational support programs to include 200 additional students with albinism across all provinces.
cta-description: Together, we can create a Zambia where persons with albinism live with dignity, equality, and opportunity.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.address: AFZ ZAMBIA, LOTI HOUSE, Cairo Road, Room G, 4th Floor, 10101 Lusaka, Zambia (opposite Kwacha House)

awareness-description: Together, we break the silence and shatter misconceptions about albinism. Through education, advocacy, and community support, we create a world where every person with albinism can live with dignity, equality, and hope.
awareness-stat-1-desc: People worldwide are born with albinism
donate-page-description: Your donation helps us advocate for the rights, dignity, and inclusion of persons with albinism in Zambia. Every contribution makes a difference in building a more inclusive society.
impact-desc-sunscreen: Provides sunscreen for one person with albinism for 3 months
impact-desc-workshop: Funds awareness workshop in one community
impact-desc-education: Supports educational materials for 10 students with albinism
newsletter-signup: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates

alternative-supplies-desc: Donate sunscreen, protective clothing, educational materials, or other needed items.

community_outreach.title: Community Outreach
community_outreach.description: AFZ reaches out to communities across Zambia, providing education and support to persons with albinism and their families.

education_awareness.title: Education and Awareness
education_awareness.description: Our educational programs help break down barriers and create understanding about albinism in schools and communities.

healthcare_support.title: Healthcare Support
healthcare_support.description: We provide essential healthcare support including sunscreen, protective clothing, and medical coordination for persons with albinism.

advocacy_rights.title: Advocacy and Rights
advocacy_rights.description: Working with policymakers and communities to ensure the rights and dignity of persons with albinism are protected and respected.

community_photos.title: AFZ in Action
community_photos.intro: Discover the impact of AFZ's work through our community engagements, outreach programs, and awareness campaigns across Zambia.

events.title: Community Events
events.description: Participating in local events and celebrations to promote albinism awareness and inclusion.

outreach.title: Outreach Programs
outreach.description: Bringing education and support directly to communities, schools, and healthcare facilities across Zambia.

campaigns.title: Awareness Campaigns
campaigns.description: Running targeted campaigns to educate communities about albinism and combat discrimination and myths.

stories.title: Success Stories
stories.description: Celebrating the achievements and positive impact of our programs on individuals and communities.

get_involved.title: Get Involved in Our Mission
get_involved.description: Join us in creating a more inclusive society for persons with albinism in Zambia.

awareness.title: Breaking the silence on Albinism
awareness.description: The Albinism Foundation Zambia is dedicated to advocating for the rights of individuals with albinism, promoting awareness, and building an inclusive society where everyone can thrive.

about.title: Albinism Foundation of Zambia - AFZ
about.description: Advocating for the rights, dignity, and inclusion of persons with albinism in Zambia through education, support, and policy reform.

about_page.title: About AFZ
about_page.description: Learn about our mission, vision, values, and the dedicated team working to advocate for persons with albinism in Zambia.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To advocate for the rights, dignity, and inclusion of persons with albinism in Zambia through awareness campaigns, policy advocacy, support services, and community empowerment programs.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A Zambia where persons with albinism live with dignity, equality, and full participation in all aspects of society.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Compassion, integrity, inclusivity, advocacy, and community empowerment guide everything we do.

2016.title: Foundation Established
2016.desc: AFZ was founded with a vision to advocate for persons with albinism in Zambia.

2018.title: First Major Campaign
2018.desc: Launched our first nationwide awareness campaign reaching 5 provinces.

2020.title: Policy Advocacy Success
2020.desc: Successfully advocated for inclusion of albinism rights in national policies.

2022.title: Program Expansion
2022.desc: Extended our programs to cover all 10 provinces of Zambia.

2024.title: Digital Transformation
2024.desc: Launched digital platforms to reach more communities and provide online support.

ceo.bio: Leading AFZ's mission with over 15 years of experience in human rights advocacy.

programs.bio: Overseeing the development and implementation of all AFZ programs and initiatives.

advocacy.bio: Coordinating policy advocacy efforts and government relations.

community.bio: Managing community engagement and outreach programs across Zambia.
